author: Rainer Winkler
description:
Not using normal clothing, but clothing that covers only a limited parts of the skin may be unpopular under the workers, but it reduces the heat stress.

This is not an innovative idea, but fast and cheap to implement, so I post it here. Even if a new cooling technique is invented, it will work better if all other possible actions are performed.
summary: Each layer of clothing between PPE increases the 	heat transmission resistance.
title: Reduce isolating cloth under PPE to improve heat transfer out of PPE
